SEARCH
Package com.group22.entities

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.group22.entities.Entity
com.group22.entities.Player
public class Player extends Entity
The Player class represents the player-controlled character in the game. It extends the Entity class with player-specific functionality such as handling input, updating player status, and drawing the player sprite.
